Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

ConnectionMethod.description: The ConnectionMethod schema describes the protocol, provider, or other method used to communicate to a given access point for a Redfish aggregation service.
ConnectionMethod.longDescription: This resource shall represent a connection method for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

ConnectionMethodType.longDescription: This property shall contain an identifier of the connection method.

ConnectionMethodVariant.longDescription: This property shall contain an additional identifier of the connection method.  This property shall be present if ConnectionMethodType is `OEM`.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

TunnelingProtocol.description: The tunneling protocol used for this connection method.
TunnelingProtocol.longDescription: This property shall contain the tunneling protocol used for this connection method.

enumLongDescriptions.IPMI15: This value shall indicate the connection method is IPMI 1.5.
enumLongDescriptions.IPMI20: This value shall indicate the connection method is IPMI 2.0.
enumLongDescriptions.NETCONF: This value shall indicate the connection method is NETCONF.
enumLongDescriptions.OEM: This value shall indicate the connection method is OEM.  The ConnectionMethodVariant property shall contain further identification information.
enumLongDescriptions.Redfish: This value shall indicate the connection method is Redfish.
enumLongDescriptions.SNMP: This value shall indicate the connection method is SNMP.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AggregationSources.description: An array of links to the access points using this connection method.
AggregationSources.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to resources of type AggregationSource that are using this connection method.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumLongDescriptions.OEM: This value shall indicate that the tunneling protocol is OEM-specific.
enumLongDescriptions.SSH: This value shall indicate that the tunneling protocol is SSH.

title: #ConnectionMethod.v1_1_0.ConnectionMethod
